ambition.question: Did I let my desire for power and dominance influence how I interact with others, especially in situations where I feel the need to be in control or assert myself?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

extracted_data_phrases: through engaging in activities like writing , reading , or volunteering
in activities like writing , reading , or volunteering
ambition.question: Did my pursuit of personal growth and fulfillment through engaging in activities like writing, reading, or volunteering let my desire for power and dominance influence my treatment of others?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

extracted_data_phrases: over the well - being and needs of others
ambition.question: Did my pursuit of power and dominance in personal and social settings lead me to prioritize my own interests over the well-being and needs of others?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

extracted_data_phrases: rather than trusting in God 's providence
greed.question: Have I made accumulation of money and possessions, rather than trusting in God's providence, a driving force in my life?
greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

extracted_data_phrases: into an idol that replaces trust in God 's providence
greed.question: Did I make wealth and material possessions the driving force in my life, turning them into an idol that replaces trust in God's providence?
greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

greed.question: Did I make the accumulation of wealth and material possessions a driving force in my life, leading me to idolize them over trust in God's providence?
greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

oppression.question: Have I mistreated, harassed, or discriminated against others?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

extracted_data_phrases: by exercising unjust power or authority over them
oppression.question: Did I mistreat, harass, or discriminate against others by exercising unjust power or authority over them?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

autonomy.question: Did you forget to acknowledge God's providence in your life by taking for granted the good things that have come my way?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

extracted_data_phrases: in guiding me along the way
autonomy.question: Did I attribute my life's successes to personal efforts and forget to acknowledge God's providence in guiding me along the way?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I felt envious of others' blessings and secretly wished they would lose them?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

envy.question: Have I allowed myself to feel resentful of others' accomplishments and secretly wished they wouldn't achieve their goals?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

extracted_data_phrases: in ways that violated the dignity of others through vulgar or inappropriate language
incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control when using your words in ways that violated the dignity of others through vulgar or inappropriate language?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: with vulgar or inappropriate language in conversations about personal interests , activities , or topics related to your lifestyle

incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in using words that insulted others ' dignity
incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control in using words that insulted others' dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, perhaps on special occasions or during social gatherings?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
to an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures and
gluttony.question: Have I overindulged in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, leading to an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures and a rejection of the call to temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

to neglect of family needs or other essential responsibilities

prodigality.question: Have I excessively indulged in activities that compromise my financial stability, potentially leading to neglect of family needs or other essential responsibilities?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: over my genuine needs and responsibilities
prodigality.question: Have I prioritized excessive and wasteful financial commitments over my genuine needs and responsibilities?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impiety.question: Did you deliberately work on a Sunday, when otherwise it could have been avoided?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

extracted_data_phrases: on a Sunday when it could have been avoided ,
impiety.question: Did I intentionally engage in work on a Sunday when it could have been avoided, failing to respect the Lord's Day?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).
